author: Joshua Fruhlinger
title: Cutting-Edge Cat Toys Your Pet Won’t Immediately Destroy
text:
1. Scrambled Pets Shaped like an egg, SHRU (pictured above) rolls around in random directions at varying speeds thanks to onboard computers that help it mimic the erratic movements and sounds of small animals (complete with fluttering tail). When Tiger is done batting SHRU about, the toy automatically shuts down to conserve energy, saving you from recharging it too often via its USB port. $98, pdxpetdesign.com
2. Bugging Out
